typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PK_SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		DESCRIPTION as string,
		ACTIVE as string,
		INSERTED_DATE as timestamp,
		UPDATED_DATE as timestamp,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceSystem
RemoveUnusedRows derive(DATE_AMENDED = currentDate(),
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		AMENDOR = 'Manreg',
		CREATOR = 'Manreg') ~> DeriveConstants
SourceSystem select(mapColumn(
		PK_SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		DESCRIPTION,
		ACTIVE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveUnusedRows
DeriveConstants sink(partitionFileNames:['idx_source_system'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> idxSourceSystem
